name: Space Cowboy Simulator 2000 +Extra Expansion DLC
description:
Have you ever wanted to mow down people on a train stealing all of their money and getting random guns in space as a robot cowboy?
me neither but you can do that now in

Yes, that's right folks, a game where you play as a space cowboy, shooting through a bloody mess of people wanting to stop you from taking their hard-earned cash!

How do you play this space adventure I hear you ask? well, it's quite simple!

WASD - Move

Mouse Pos - Aim

Left Click - Shoot weapon

R - Reload when out of ammo

F - Move to the next room (when against Right Wall and room is cleared)

ESC - Pause game

PLUS all the menus are navigated with the mouse!
